column6: "THE MADNESS, THE STAR CHILD AND THE CELESTIAL MADONNA" The hottest book of 2010 continues! The world is still shaking from the revelations of #3 and there are more where those came from. IN THIS ISSUE- The true history of Nostradamus, the defeat of a Celestial at the hands of a mortal man and HOW THE WORLD ENDS! Oh, and Jonathan Hickman (FANTASTIC FOUR) and Dustin Weaver (X-MEN) have also created the most troubling idea ever-THE FOETUS OF GOD! Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Jonathan Hickman | letterer:Todd Klein | penciller:Gerald Parel | editor:Joe Quesada | colorist:Christina Strain | artist:Dustin Weaver
